name: Amabie
description: Amabie is a Japanese yokai, a three-tailed mermaid that emerges from the sea and makes prophecy about good harvests and epidemics. This creature was once believed to have said to humans: "Draw me and show me to people, so you can be free from the disease." Based on this belief, Amabie has become popular during this pandemic. Please collect and may Amabie always protect your good health ;)
